Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.util

  • Class
    Description
    DerivativeBufferSupplier<O,D>
    Creates a derivative buffer using the original buffer's context information.
    NetBuf<B extends net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf & NetBuf<? super B>>
    Super-interface for all net buffers to make sure they have the same interface and implement the same methods.
    NetBuf.SavedReaderIndex
    Holds an index into a NetByteBuf that can be restored.
    NetBufImplHelper
    Utility class to help with implementing NetBuf.
    NetBufs
    Utility methods for working with KNet buffers.
    NetByteBuf
    Special FriendlyByteBuf class that provides methods specific to "offset" reading and writing - like writing a single bit to the stream, and auto-compacting it with similar bits into a single byte.
    NetCodecs
    NetBuf Codec utilities.
    NetRegistryByteBuf
    Special FriendlyByteBuf that is like a RegistryNetByteBuf but that extends RegistryFriendlyByteBuf instead of NetByteBuf.
    Palette<T>
    Maps objects to integers, allowing for smaller packet sizes when the same objects are referenced multiple times.
    PayloadConnection
    Represents a connection capable of sending a payload to a receiver.
    PayloadSender
    Represents something capable of sending a payload to a receiver.
    RegistryNetByteBuf
    A NetByteBuf bound to a particular RegistryAccess instance.
